name: Learn Python
description: Programming fundamentals for economists — data manipulation, visualization, and workflows

resources.name: Coding for Economists
resources.why: Built specifically for econ researchers

resources.name: The Missing Semester (MIT)
resources.why: Git, shell, debugging — skills they don't teach in PhD programs

resources.name: Python for Econometrics
resources.why: NumPy, pandas, statsmodels from Kevin Sheppard

resources.name: Python Data Science Handbook
resources.why: Free reference for NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib

name: Learn Statistics
description: Hypothesis testing, inference, and distributions — the foundation for empirical work

resources.name: StatQuest (Josh Starmer)
resources.why: Visual intuition for stats — the 'Bill Nye of Statistics'

resources.name: Seeing Theory (Brown)
resources.why: Beautiful interactive visualizations for building intuition

resources.name: Think Stats
resources.why: Programming-first approach with real datasets

resources.name: Scipy.stats Documentation
resources.why: Reference for distributions and tests

packages.name: pingouin
packages.why: ANOVA, t-tests, and correlations made easy

name: Learn ML
description: Prediction, tree models, and cross-validation — for forecasting and pattern recognition

resources.name: Introduction to Statistical Learning
resources.why: Free, runnable Python code, intuition first

resources.name: Google ML Crash Course
resources.why: 130+ interactive exercises, refreshed 2024

resources.name: Hands-On Machine Learning (Géron)
resources.why: Production-focused, complements ISLR's statistical focus

resources.name: fast.ai Practical Deep Learning
resources.why: Code first, theory second

resources.name: Andrew Ng's ML Specialization
resources.why: The classic introduction, rebuilt 2022 with Python

resources.name: Andrew Ng's Deep Learning Specialization
resources.why: CNNs, RNNs, and transformers from the master

packages.name: scikit-learn
packages.why: The go-to library for classical ML

name: Learn Causal Inference
description: Treatment effects, DiD, RDD, and IV — answer 'what if' questions with data

resources.name: Causal Inference for the Brave and True
resources.why: The best free intro with Python code

resources.name: The Effect
resources.why: DAGs that don't suck, readable and modern

resources.name: Causal Inference: The Mixtape
resources.why: Reads like a conversation, not a textbook

name: Learn Product Sense
description: Metrics, experimentation, and business thinking — bridge economics and product decisions

resources.name: Trustworthy Online Controlled Experiments (Kohavi)
resources.why: THE definitive book — praised by Jeff Dean and Adam D'Angelo

resources.name: Eppo's Experimentation Guides
resources.why: Practical, written by practitioners

resources.name: GrowthBook Documentation
resources.why: Free, open-source, structured learning path

resources.name: Evan Miller: How Not To Run an A/B Test
resources.why: Short, lethal, career-saving

resources.name: Netflix Tech Blog - Experimentation
resources.why: Real case studies at scale

name: Learn SQL
description: Querying data, joins, and aggregations — essential for any data role

resources.name: SQLBolt
resources.why: No setup, run queries in browser — start here

resources.name: Mode SQL Tutorial
resources.why: Interactive lessons with real database

resources.name: SELECT Star SQL
resources.why: Interactive book teaching SQL through meaningful analysis

resources.name: 8 Week SQL Challenge (Danny Ma)
resources.why: 8 business case studies with CTEs and window functions

resources.name: DataLemur
resources.why: Real DS interview questions with business context

packages.name: duckdb
packages.why: Modern SQL on your laptop, reads Parquet

name: Learn LeetCode
description: Data structures and algorithms for coding interviews — learn foundations first, then grind

resources.name: Structy
resources.why: Designed for true beginners, progressive difficulty ($60/yr)

resources.name: Abdul Bari (YouTube)
resources.why: Exceptional whiteboard DSA explanations

resources.name: NeetCode
resources.why: Curated roadmap with video explanations

resources.name: Blind 75 / Grind 75
resources.why: The 75 problems you need to master

resources.name: LeetCode Patterns
resources.why: 14 patterns to solve any question

name: Learn Automation
description: Web scraping, APIs, and workflow automation — collect and process data at scale

resources.name: Automate the Boring Stuff with Python
resources.why: Free, practical skills for data work

resources.name: Postman Academy
resources.why: Free API certification path — often more useful than scraping

resources.name: Real Python: Web Scraping
resources.why: BeautifulSoup and requests guide

resources.name: Playwright for Python
resources.why: Modern browser automation (faster than Selenium)

resources.name: Scrapy Documentation
resources.why: Industrial-strength web scraping

name: Learn Optimization (OR)
description: Linear programming, convex optimization, and combinatorial methods — solve pricing, scheduling, and allocation problems

resources.name: Convex Optimization (Boyd & Vandenberghe)
resources.why: The bible — free online, universally cited

resources.name: Stanford EE364A (YouTube)
resources.why: Boyd's legendary lectures — the gold standard

resources.name: Discrete Optimization (Coursera)
resources.why: Van Hentenryck's course — actually makes you implement

resources.name: CVXPY Short Course
resources.why: Hands-on convex optimization in Python

packages.name: cvxpy
packages.why: Write math as code — the standard for convex problems

packages.name: scipy.optimize
packages.why: Built into SciPy — start here for basics

name: Learn Agentic Workflows
description: Build AI agents that reason, plan, and execute — tool use, multi-agent systems, and orchestration

resources.name: Agentic AI (DeepLearning.AI)
resources.why: Andrew Ng on the four design patterns — start here

resources.name: AI Agents in LangGraph (DeepLearning.AI)
resources.why: Build agents from scratch with Harrison Chase

resources.name: Building Effective Agents (Anthropic)
resources.why: Design patterns from Claude's creators — best practitioner guide

resources.name: LangGraph Documentation
resources.why: Official docs — the industry standard framework
